about_the_game:
Clever Girls is a story-driven, relationship-focused, turn-based DinosauRPG!
Experience the tactical RPG journey — and interpersonal drama — of a pack of four renegade dinosaurs as they evade the clutches of the corporation that made them. Battle poachers, ambush corporate enforcers, and break out of your cage!

USE YOUR INSTINCTS TO OUTWIT YOUR PREY

Stalk, hunt and ambush to escape your human captors! Use your superior senses to track and eliminate human enemies, malevolent robots, and more — all whilst honing your teamwork as a party, and gaining experience for each character. Turn-based tactics give you plenty of time to coordinate a well-timed strategic ambush. Grow stronger in each battle and diversify your strategies with unlockable abilities. Choose whether to evade enemies with stealth, outsmart them with vocal mimicry or decimate them with brute dino strength as you fight for your freedom!

FORM DEEP RELATIONSHIPS WHERE YOUR CHOICES MATTER

Form friendships, romances and rivalries between the characters as you dive into a deep yet charming sci-fi narrative. Dynamic and nuanced relationship mechanics track the changing feelings between your four dino party members.

Make dialogue choices to steer the direction of the party's impressions of each other. As relationships progress, unlock powerful "Teamwork Abilities", themed after each combination of dinosaurs and the direction their relationship has taken.

FROM BACK IN TIME — FORGE YOUR OWN FUTURE

Break out into a near-future sci-fi landscape, where bioengineered life from prehistoric earth explores a near-future, abandoned sci-fi island! Explore the ruins of corporate ambition, and see modern humanity through prehistoric eyes. Find strange human artifacts and equip them to your characters, or decorate your camp with mementos to gain stat increases and perks.
Usher in a brand-new "time of the dinosaurs"!

FEATURES

  • 4 unique dinosaur characters with their own combat style and abilities
  • Deep, dynamic relationship system: form friendships, romances and rivalries as you like between each character, or just see what happens naturally!
  • A narrative where your choices matter, full of alternative paths! Use the "Story Graph" system to explore repeat playthroughs.
  • A gorgeous stylized retro-3D world to roam around (and ambush prey) in!
